code: import*as axios from'axios';import{setUpdatedUsersThunk}from'../Redux/usersReducer';export var apiRequest={getUsers:function getUsers(page){return axios.get("https://frontend-test-assignment-api.abz.agency/api/v1/users?page=".concat(page,"&count=6"));},getToken:function getToken(){return axios.get("https://frontend-test-assignment-api.abz.agency/api/v1/token");},getPositions:function getPositions(){return axios.get("https://frontend-test-assignment-api.abz.agency/api/v1/positions");},register:function register(name,email,phone,position_id,file,token){var formData=new FormData();formData.append('position_id',position_id);formData.append('name',name);formData.append('email',email);formData.append('phone',phone);formData.append('photo',file);return axios.post("https://frontend-test-assignment-api.abz.agency/api/v1/users",formData,{headers:{'token':token,'Content-Type':'multipart/form-data'}});}};
